title: Windows 8.1 X86 3in1 en-US Sep 2016 {Generation2}
description:
* Windows 8.1 X86 3in1 en-US Sep 2016 {Generation2}


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: WIN81.X86.en-US.Sep2016.iso
* Size: 4,37GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: ef839a0a
* MD5 : 96ddd16d06384f89b3c0a7fa6447da4e
* SHA-1: cf0897b33b4c6a8939fc8eb7db446491354bb772

[ SOURCES ]

* dvd-6051550 & dvd-6050710

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed:

* Enabling .NET Framework 3.5 
* .NET Framework 4.6.2 ( KB3120803 )
* Important & Security Updates - 2016-09-13
* Windows Defender Updates

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* KB890830

[ FEATURES ]

* UEFI-ready 
* (Use attached Rufus USB-tool to make UEFI-bootable).
* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)

[ LANGUAGE ]

* en-US = ENGLISH US

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Home
* Windows 8.1 Pro
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise

Activation by KMS
(Exclusions are pre-set in Defender)

[ ACTIVATION INSTRUCTIONS ]

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.  
* For activation, select "KMS" and click on "Begin Install".
* To skip activation, just click on "Exit".

[ SCREENSHOTS ]

[url]https://extraimago.com/image/w3Bl[/url]

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD-DL at slow speed.

[ CREDITS ]

* ashish.k, milrob & stevie-boy  for continued
* support & help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ ET & TPB
